Articles.Content:
I am looking for a mod that can with a toggle of a button (say Y for example) and it'll tell me everything about the location my mouse is pointing so I can aim at a crator edge or mountain range and see this info:

Location (map coordinates)

Height (Above sea level)

Distance (from the selected vessel(even kerbals should have this))

and any other info someone can think of...

There might be a mod to do this out there, but I don't know of it.

Edited October 12, 2014 by ZooNamedGames
There's no mod for this, though some of the features are in Mechjeb's landing site selector. That would be a good place to start if you wanted to make it.

You might try http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86062-WIP-Plugin-Parts-LaserDist-0-3-for-KSP-0-24-Alpha

EDIT- But not really what your look for don't think.

EDIT- But some of it you can get from ScanSat mod

Edited October 12, 2014 by Mecripp2

Thing is I want to have it all in one mod and-

No- I have NO clue how to mod. Especially not this one.
The Lazor mod supplies this functionality, although it supports a metric crapton of features more.

The Lazor mod supplies this functionality, although it supports a metric crapton of features more.

That's another thing- I've had a bit of a bad relationship with the mod with it not always working properly. So I'd prefer not.

Better Question- Is anyone willing to make this for me?
